evidence.claim: CollectCo utilizes AWS cloud services for scalable data storage and processing.
They follow HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive health information.
Integration with EHR systems is supported through HL7 protocols.
The company leverages Azure services for their application infrastructure.
Kafka is used for real-time data streaming in their platform.

icp.icp_reason: CollectCo uses EDI X12 for healthcare integration, indicating relevant use cases.
